scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path='./supabase/supabase-config.js'; if(fs.existsSync(path)) { let c=fs.readFileSync(path,'utf8'); c=c.replace('%SUPABASE_URL%',process.env.SUPABASE_URL).replace('%SUPABASE_ANON_KEY%',process.env.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY); fs.writeFileSync(path,c); console.log('Supabase config updated'); } else { console.log('File not found at:', path); }"
